instructions: CRITICAL: Before coding ANYTHING, you MUST read these files in ORDER:
build_rules: DO NOT CODE until you've read ALL required files
Follow the documented tech stack EXACTLY
Use Next.js 14 + TypeScript + Tailwind for frontend
Use Supabase for database with RLS
Use Claude API for AI (no other models)
Hide ALL technical complexity from users
